newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0810 CDT.
LIVE CATTLE - Up 0.100 to off 0.100 cent. Active fed cattle and beef sales but live seen at near-term top.
FEEDER CATTLE - Up 0.100 to off 0.100 cent. Strong cash market and index up but corn futures called higher.
LEAN HOGS - Off 0.100 to up 0.100 cent. Steady to lower live calls but pork products improviing and hog supplies off.
PORK BELLIES - Off 0.100 to up 0.100 cent. Further rolling out of May seen. Light hog kill pace seen continuing but product ideas mixed.
